subproject.corporate outcome: Capacities of national and local institutions enhanced to scale up proven MDG acceleration interventions and to plan, monitor, report and evaluate the MDG progress in the context of related national development priorities
subproject.description: 1) Support conflict prevention schemes in Kisangani, Buta and Isiro. 2) Lay the foundations for sustainable long term development by contributing to the re-establishment of basic services and productive capacities of the targeted communities.
subproject.gender code: Gender equality as a significant objective
subproject.title: SRPI: Orientale Province

subproject.corporate outcome: Capacities of national and local institutions enhanced to scale up proven MDG acceleration interventions and to plan, monitor, report and evaluate the MDG progress in the context of related national development priorities
subproject.description:
Main Objectives in Equateur:
The creation of a participatory framework to analyze, identify and peacefully resolve inter/intra community conflict, as well as issues involving local authorities and civil society, 
including human rights violations and sexual violence. 2) The identification of economic recovery opportunities in marginalized and vulnerable communities, with particular emphasis on unemployed youth.
subproject.gender code: No noticeable contribution to gender equality
subproject.title: SRPI: EQUATEUR

subproject.description:
Main objectives in Kasaï Orientale:
1) Contribute to increasing access to basic social services. 2) Contribute to building the capacities of the provincial administration and forging partnerships between the local authorities and civil society
